preqs: 12 credit points at second year level in Art History and Theory, or Theory of Art and Design, or Visual Culture,  or permission from Unit Coordinator

rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {AHT1%, CLS1%, TAD1%, VSA1%}

description: The overall objective of this unit is to gain an understanding of the history of the moving image as it sits in a contemporary art context. The course will cover a range of moving image works, from feature-length films produced with a cinema audience in mind to short films and artist-made films made for art audiences, gallery installations and non-cinematic modes of projection.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
